availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, carpenter. Virgina native. Married to Charlotte Harrell. Father of Joseph Harrell, Elmon Harrell, Byron Harrell, George W. Harrell, Elizabeth Harrell and Louisia Harrell. Carpenter in Cincinnati in 1850. Carpenter in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 7, p. 255B-257A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 5, p. 417.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 18, p. 350B.
